Connection.description: üñáÔ∏è A bidirectional connection between two pieces of a design.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the connection.
description.title: Description

gap.description: ‚ÜïÔ∏è The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
gap.title: Gap

shift.description: ‚ÜîÔ∏è The optional lateral shift (applied after the rotation, the turn and the tilt in the plane) between the connected and the connecting piece..
shift.title: Shift

rise.description: ü™ú The optional vertical rise in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece. Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
rise.title: Raise

rotation.description: üîÑ The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
rotation.title: Rotation

turn.description: üõû The optional turn perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.  Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
turn.title: Turn

tilt.description: ‚ÜóÔ∏è The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
tilt.title: Tilt

x.description: ‚û°Ô∏è The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
x.title: X

y.description: ‚¨ÜÔ∏è The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
y.title: Y

connected.description: üß≤ The connected side of the connection.

connecting.description: üß≤ The connecting side of the connection.

Connection.title: Connection

Design.description: üèôÔ∏è A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the design.
description.title: Description

icon.description: ü™ô The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
icon.title: Icon

image.description: üñºÔ∏è The optional url to the image of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
image.title: Image

variant.description: üîÄ The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.
variant.title: Variant

view.description: ü•Ω The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.
view.title: View

created.description: üïí The creation date of the design.
created.title: Created

updated.description: üïí The last update date of the design.
updated.title: Updated

Design.title: Design

DiagramPoint.description: üì∫ A 2d-point (xy) of integers in screen coordinate system.

x.description: üèÅ The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
x.title: X

y.description: üèÅ The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
y.title: Y

DiagramPoint.title: DiagramPoint

PieceId.description: ü™™ The props to identify the piece within the parent design.
PieceId.title: PieceId

Piece.description: ‚≠ï A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the piece.
description.title: Description

plane.description: ‚ó≥ The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

center.description: üì∫ The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.

Piece.title: Piece

Plane.description: ‚ó≥ A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).
Plane.title: Plane

PortId.description: ü™™ The props to identify the port within the parent type.
PortId.title: PortId

Port.description: üîå A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the port.
description.title: Description

family.description: üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ The optional family of the port. This allows to define explicit compatibility with other ports.
family.title: Family

compatibleFamilies.description: ‚úÖ The optional other compatible families of the port. An empty list means this port is compatible with all other ports.
compatibleFamilies.title: Compatiblefamilies

point.description: ‚úñÔ∏è The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.

direction.description: ‚û°Ô∏è The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.

t.description: üíç The parameter t [0,1[ where the port will be shown on the ring of a piece in the diagram. It starts at 12 o`clock and turns clockwise.
t.title: T

Port.title: Port

Quality.description: üìè A quality is a named value with a unit and a definition.

value.description: üìè The optional value [ text | url ] of the quality. No value is equivalent to true for the name.
value.title: Value

unit.description: üìè The optional unit of the value of the quality.
unit.title: Unit

definition.description: üìè The optional definition [ text | uri ] of the quality.
definition.title: Definition

Quality.title: Quality

Representation.description: üíæ A representation is a link to a resource that describes a type for a certain level of detail and tags.

url.description: üîó The Unique Resource Locator (URL) to the resource of the representation.
url.title: Url

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the representation.
description.title: Description

mime.description: ‚úâÔ∏è The Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the content of the resource of the representation.
mime.title: Mime

tags.description: üè∑Ô∏è The optional tags to group representations. No tags means default.
tags.title: Tags

Representation.title: Representation

Side.description: üß± A side of a piece in a connection.
Side.title: Side

TypeId.description: ü™™ The props to identify the type.

variant.description: üîÄ The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.
variant.title: Variant

TypeId.title: TypeId

Type.description: üß© A type is a reusable element that can be connected with other types over ports.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the type.
description.title: Description

icon.description: ü™ô The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
icon.title: Icon

image.description: üñºÔ∏è The optional url to the image of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
image.title: Image

variant.description: üîÄ The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.
variant.title: Variant

unit.description: ‚ìÇÔ∏è The length unit of the point and the direction of the ports of the type.
unit.title: Unit

created.description: üïí The creation date of the type.
created.title: Created

updated.description: üïí The last update date of the type.
updated.title: Updated

Type.title: Type

description: üóÉÔ∏è A kit is a collection of types and designs.

description.description: üí¨ The optional human-readable description of the kit.
description.title: Description

icon.description: ü™ô The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB. kit.
icon.title: Icon

image.description: üñºÔ∏è The optional url to the image of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
image.title: Image

preview.description: üîÆ The optional url of the preview image of the kit. The url must point to a landscape image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a 2x1 rectangle. The image must be at least 1920x960 pixels and smaller than 15 MB.
preview.title: Preview

version.description: üîÄ The optional version of the kit. No version means the latest version.
version.title: Version

remote.description: ‚òÅÔ∏è The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit remotely.
remote.title: Remote

homepage.description: üè† The optional url of the homepage of the kit.
homepage.title: Homepage

license.description: ‚öñÔ∏è The optional license [ spdx id | url ] of the kit.
license.title: License

created.description: üïí The creation date of the kit.
created.title: Created

updated.description: üïí The last update date of the kit.
updated.title: Updated

title: Kit
